# Last inn pakker og data

```{r, output: false}

rm(list=ls()) 
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)

df_andeler <- df_andeler %>% 
  filter(year>=1875)

url <- "https://github.com/uit-sok-1004-h22/uit-sok-1004-h22.github.io/blob/e36b270c865e077f797e9426e32b47740f2f3847/rkode/bnp.xlsx?raw=true"

df_bnp <- url %>%  
  read.xlsx(sheet=1) %>%

```
